word: a good voice to beg bacon
definition: said of a person with an unpleasant voice

word: beyond a shadow of a doubt
definition: in a manner or to a degree that could not be doubted

word: breach of the covenant of warranty
definition: a failure of the seller's guarantee of good title

word: breach of trust with fraudulent intent
definition: larceny after trust rather than after unlawful taking

word: characteristic root of a square matrix
definition: (mathematics) any number such that a given square matrix minus that number times the identity matrix has a zero determinant

word: court of assize and nisi prius
definition: the county courts of England (replaced in 1971 by Crown courts)

word: freedom from cruel and unusual punishment
definition: a right guaranteed by the 8th amendment to the US Constitution

word: have a bun in the oven
imaginary part of a complex number
definition: the part of a complex number that has the square root of -1 as a factor

word: keep one's nose to the grindstone
keep one's shoulder to the wheel
on the spur of the moment
oblique vein of the left atrium
definition: a tributary of the coronary sinus

word: posterior vein of the left ventricle
definition: arises near the apex of the heart and empties into the coronary sinus

word: pull the wool over someone's eyes
definition: conceal one's true motives from especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end

word: right to the pursuit of happiness
definition: the right to try to find happiness

word: respiratory distress syndrome of the newborn
definition: an acute lung disease of the newborn (especially the premature newborn)

word: take the bull by the horns
definition: face a difficulty and grapple with it without avoiding it
